benefits.value: Lương được xem xét, đánh giá tăng định kỳ một năm 2 lần.
Thưởng cuối năm và thưởng các ngày lễ tết.
Teambuilding hàng năm để nâng cao tinh thần đội nhóm trong tổ chức.
Mỗi cá nhân hiểu rõ chức trách và nhiệm vụ của mình.
Cơ hội phát triển năng lực CBNV thông qua các hoạt động đào tạo về chuyên môn và kỹ năng mềm hàng tuần, hàng tháng.
Có khung năng lực rõ ràng
Môi trường làm việc năng động, thoải mái.
Đồng nghiệp vui vẻ, thân thiện.
Luôn đề cao sự hợp tác và tinh thần đồng đội
Thời gian làm việc: Từ 8h00 - 17h00 (nghỉ trưa 1 tiếng) - Từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6

value: Có 1 năm kinh nghiệm sử dụng C++ trở lên
Có kinh nghiệm xây dựng Architecture Design, High Level, Low Level
Có kinh nghiệm với batch/shell script
Có kiến thức về REST API, RTSP, xử lý đa nguồn
Có kiến thức tốt về OOP, Design Pattern
Có kinh nghiệm xây dựng Architecture Design, High Level, Low Leve

Kỹ năng mềm:
Nhanh nhẹn, trung thực, nhiệt tình trong công việc.
Kỹ năng làm việc độc lập và làm việc nhóm tốt.
Cẩn thận, có tinh thần trách nhiệm, tự tin, quyết đoán
Kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề tốt.

data.title: BACKEND .NET DEVELOPER
data.content:
Groove Technology is a cutting-edge software services provider specializing in custom software systems and solutions. We seek to attract and retain the smartest and most capable staff in and around Ho Chi Minh City to offer the highest level of service to our customers from Asia, Australia, and Europe.

We are a dynamic, process-oriented company with a keen focus on high-quality delivery and continuous improvement. We are seeking open-minded, creative, pro-active professionals who are capable of thinking outside of the box and who are comfortable with sharing their ideas.

benefits.value: 13th month salary and 14 annual leave.
Medical and Accident Insurance program.
International, dynamic, friendly working environment.
Clear and stable career growth.
Many opportunities for personal and professional development.
Professional training.
Company trip and regular team building events, sport activities…

value: To be successful in this role you must have:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent work experience.
Have 2+ years of work experience as an Engineer delivering projects using Microsoft Stack (C#).
Have a strong understanding of object-oriented programming.
Have strong experience in developing complex SQL queries, stored procedures, views, and functions.
Have good experience in performance tuning strategies.
Have knowledge of software development and user interface web applications.
Have experience with source control such as TFS / SVN / GIT.
Clear, concise communication along with logical/analytical skills.
Have a competent judgment to inform problems superiors on time.
Have experience managing timelines and task priority.
The following is considered highly advantageous:
Strong in communicating in English.
Logistics domain experience.

data.title: [Junior/Middle/Senior] Full-stack Developer
data.content:
Our company is seeking full time Junior, Mid and Senior Full-stack Developers with .NET C# experience in Web and Mobile application. This position will be ideally suited to a person with experience developing commercial software and is passionate about quality and standards.

You are expected to possess excellent software development life cycle knowledge and excellent communication skills in both verbal and written to liaise with stakeholders. Documentation skills would be an advantage but not mandatory.

benefits.value: 100% salary during Probation Period
Weekly budget for team buildings  (150,000 VND per week per person)
Fully sponsored onsite trip to Titan international offices (AU, Thailand, UAE, EU etc.)
Gifts on special occasions + holidays (Tet, Full-moon festival, Birthday, Christmas etc.)
Employee Referral Program
Internal events every month (Happy lunch, Milk tea Friday, etc.)
Sport Activity Funding (Football every Tuesday & Thursday)
Education Funding
Time: Mon - Fri ( 08:30 - 05: 30 )

value: Technical attributes:
Have experience (fundamental knowledge) in .Net (3.5, 4.X) development in C#
Strong technical skills in ASP.NET, Web API, MVC, or other .NET frameworks and .NET development tools.
Experience with HTML.CSS3 & JavaScript (jQuery, Knock-out, Require, AngularJS)
Experience with API integration through web services
Working experience with Microsoft SQL Server, SQL queries
Mobile application development experience (iOS, Android, Xamarin is a plus)
Ability to participate in code reviews and be able to work autonomously and as part of a team
Communication level in English (Written & Verbal)
Additional attribute (Preferred not required):
Working experience in ERP type systems, Accounting or Retail POS systems etc.
Experience with workflow based systems
Experience in Agile Development methodologies
Experience in Win forms is a big plus
Experience with Cloud Services (AWS, Azure, GCP etc.)
GPA > = 7.0 is a big plus

Benefits package: Excellent Remuneration with Incentives and Bonus policy + other benefits (premiumhealthcare insurance, days off, onsite training opportunity etc.) will be discussed during the interview.

benefits.value: Lương tháng 13 + hưởng lợi nhuận cổ tức khi có lợi nhuận
Review lương: 1-2 lần/ năm
Ký hợp đồng lao động, hưởng 12 ngày phép năm và các ngày nghỉ lễ, tết theo quy định của nhà nước
Đóng BHXH, BHYT, BHTN và các chính sách phúc lợi theo Luật Lao động
Cung cấp Máy tính và các thiết bị hỗ trợ công việc (nếu cần)

value: Nắm rõ về Nodejs module (commonjs/umd/webpack module), node package manager (npm/yarn)
Hiểu và sử dụng thành thạo database (SQL/NoSQL) như PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis,…
Thành thạo môi trường Nodejs cùng NestJS framework hoặc framework tương đương
Nắm rõ Git, RESTFUL, JWT, Schedule, Queue
Yêu cầu công việc :
Có trên 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc ở vị trí Backend Developer
Có kiến thức Blockchain là lợi thế.
Có khả năng và kỹ năng cộng hưởng trong việc đọc hiểu và phát triển nhu cầu ứng dụng (requirements), giải quyết vấn đề (Problem solving), quản lý thời gian.
Làm việc với các bên liên quan để phân tích ý tưởng, kiểm tra đối chiếu và làm rõ các nhu cầu nghiệp vụ.
Có kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt và trình bày tốt để có thể làm việc, giao tiếp ý tưởng với Technical leader, PO, BA và các BU khi cần thiết, chủ động giao tiếp để giải quyết công việc.
Có mindset để xây dựng sản phẩm, có tính cầu toàn và hướng tới việc nâng cấp trải nghiệm khách hàng.

data.title: Technical Leader (ReactJS, Angular, VueJS)
data.content:
ONE OF THE TOP ICT JAPANESE COMPANIES IN VIETNAM.

NEC Corp is a leader in the integration of IT and network technologies that benefit businesses and people around the world. NEC has more than 50 countries, 289 branches, and 117,418 employees worldwide. Under the company's corporate message of "Orchestrating a brighter world," NEC aims to help solve a wide range of challenging issues and to create new social value for the changing world of tomorrow.

Established in 2006, up to now, NEC Vietnam has grown with more than 160 employees in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City. We have been working hard to carry out many social contribution activities to bring more laughter and improve the quality of life.

benefits.value: Working time: Mon-Fri, Hybrid working mode (WFH available)
13th Salary + Year-End Reward (a half month) + Excellent Bonus (up to 5 months)
Special allowance for foreign language certificate (up to 500USD/month)
Full social package (SI, HI, UI) & Premium healthcare insurance (Aon)
Annual Health Check at the top healthcare center
Up to 19 days of paid leave
Free Japanese class; 1:1 class with native teachers
Udemy account provided & Sponsor examination fee for technical certificates such as AWS, Azure, PMP, etc and get the incentive (up to 10M)
Many company activities to tighten the relationship between employees: Company trip, Year-end Event, Team building, Sports Day, Family Day, Outing Trip, etc.
Reward Most Valuable Player (MVP) for individual & team twice a year
Sport clubs provided (100% sponsored by company): Football, Badminton
Professional environment with clear procedures and good working facilities
Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in Japan, and APAC.

value: Qualifications:
Bachelor’s Degree in IT or a relevant major.
At least 5+ years of hands-on software development experience.
Proven experience as a Technical Leader in web application development.
In-depth development experience in Frontend such as ReactJS, Angular, VueJS, etc.
Experience in backend-based languages (Java, .NET) is an advantage.
Being able to build a system from scratch and having knowledge of cloud base infrastructure (AWS).
Experience in reviewing source code and managing a team of developers.
Experience in making specifications such as design and test specifications.
Experience with outsourcing/offshore processes.
Willingness to troubleshoot and solve complex problems.
Flexibility to adapt to changing instructions and requirements.
Other skills:
English: Toeic 600+ or equivalent communication proficiency, Japanese is a plus.
Responsible and a high level of delivery.
A strong analytical mindset.
Hard-working and self-driven.
Fearless and eager to meet new exciting and complex challenges every day.
Energetic team player with excellent communication skills.

data.title: Senior Full-Stack Java Developer – Salary Up to $2500
data.content: We are looking for a Senior Full-Stack Java Developer to join our software team developing advanced software components for next generation ADAS and autonomous drive systems.

benefits.value: COMPETITIVE SALARY PACKAGE based on your competent plus Annual Bonus and Project Performance Bonus “FPT care” health insurance provided by AON and is exclusive for FPT employees.
Annual Summer Vacation: Base on Company’s policy.
Annual leave, working conditions follow Vietnam labor laws.
F-Town Campus provide many facilities for FPT Software employees such as football ground, basketball & volleyball, gym & yoga Centre, restaurant, cafeteria, etc.
Allowance is up to 20,000,000 VND base on level.
Other allowance such as lunch allowance, etc.
Working time: Monday - Friday | 08:00 - 17:00
In case of emergency (COVID-19), our company will flexible support candidates for online interview.

value: Experience in microservices and micro-frontend
Experience in designing and integrating RESTful APIs
Have experience with AWS: S3, SQS, DynamoDB, Lambda is a plus
Have knowledge about performance turning, exception timeout, deadlock, heap memories, local transaction and distributed transaction
Have knowledge about SQL and NoSQL
Have strong knowledge in software development life-cycle from Detail Design to Unit Test.
Other knowledge: SSH, SFTP, Web security, HTTPS Certificate are plus.
Proactive, hard-working, high responsibility and commitment are mandatory character for candidate who wants to join our team.
Customer service mindset is a huge plus
Basic Qualifications
Background prefer in the fields of Computer science or Software engineering.
At least 3 years of experience in JAVA and Spring framework/Engine: Spring Boot, Thymeleaf, Jasper
Experience in microservices and micro-frontend
Nice to have:
Docker k8s
Thymeleaf
Mapstruct
Reflection
Elasticsearch
ReactJS, Angular 6/7, AngularJS 1, Bootstrap 3, 4, JQuery, momentJ
